articles.title: Amazon is shutting down its app store on Android - TechCrunch
articles.description: Amazon will discontinue its app store for Android on August 20 this year. The company sent a notice to developers indicating that they will no longer be
articles.content:
Amazon will discontinue its app store for Android on August 20 this year. The company sent a notice to developers indicating that they will no longer be able to submit new apps to the store.
